sen.j: 桜馬場通（さくらのばんばどおり）は、京都市左京区内の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Sakura-no-banba-doori street is one of the streets running from north to south in Sakyo Ward in Kyoto City.
Sakura-no-banba-doori street is a street running from north to south in Sakyo Ward in Kyoto City.
Sakuranobanba-dori Street is a street running from north to south in Sakyo Ward in Kyoto City.

sen.j: 北は丸太町通から南は冷泉通まで延長300mに満たない短い通り。
sen.e: Sakura-no-banba-doori street is a short street running from a point on Marutamacih-doori street at its north end and to a point on Reizei-doori street at its south end and spanning over a length of less than 300 m.
Sakura-no-banba-doori street is a short street from the north end of Marutamacih-doori street to a point on Reizei-doori street at its south end and spans a length of less than 300 m.
Sakuranobanba-dori Street is a short street from the north end of Marutamach-dori Street to a point on Reizei-dori Street at its south end and spans a length of less than 300 m.
sen.cmt: Sakuranobanba-dori Street, Marutamach-dori Street, Reizei-dori Streetに修正

sen.j: 岡崎公園の公園内に通された道であるため、歩道と車道が分離されている。
sen.e: Sakura-no-banba-doori street has sidewalks and car lanes being separated from each other because the street runs passing through Okazaki Park.
Sakura-no-banba-doori street has sidewalks and car lanes separated from each other because the street passes through Okazaki Park.
Sakuranobanba-dori Street has sidewalks and car lanes separated from each other because the street passes through Okazaki Park.
sen.cmt: Sakuranobanba-dori Streetに修正、余分なスペースを削除

sen.j: 一般家屋が並ぶのは北半分の西側のみ。
sen.e: Ordinary residences line only on west side of the northern half of Sakura-no-banba-doori street.
Ordinary residences line only the west side of the northern half of Sakura-no-banba-doori street.
Ordinary residences line only the west side of the northern half of Sakuranobanba-dori Street.

sen.j: 東側は岡崎の諸施設の並ぶ一帯で、北から京都市武道センター、およびその中に京都市指定文化財の旧武徳殿、平安神宮駐車場。
sen.e: Various kinds of facilities of Okazaki City line Sakura-no-banba-doori street on its east side and the facilities include Kyoto Municipal Martial Arts Center on the northmost position, ex-Butokuden hall which is a Kyoto Municipal Designated Cultural Asset, and Heian-jingu shrine parking lot.

Various kinds of facilities of Okazaki City line Sakura-no-banba-doori street on its east side and include Kyoto Municipal Martial Arts Center at the northmost position, ex-Butokuden hall which is a Kyoto Municipal Designated Cultural Asset, and the Heian-jingu shrine parking lot.

Various kinds of facilities of Okazaki City line Sakuranobanba-dori Street on its east side and include Kyoto Municipal Martial Arts Center at the northmost position, ex-Butokuden hall which is a Kyoto Municipal Designated Cultural Asset, and the Heian-jingu Shrine parking lot.
sen.cmt: Sakuranobanba-dori Streetに修正、shrineの頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.j: 西側の南半分は琵琶湖疏水の本線が北流する区間に沿う。
sen.e: The west side of the south half of Sakura-no-banba-doori street is adjacent to a section of the main line of Biwa Lake canal which flows northward.
The west side of the south half of Sakura-no-banba-doori street is adjacent to a section of the main line of Biwa Lake canal which flows northward.
The west side of the south half of Sakuranobanba-dori Street is adjacent to a section of the main line of Lake Biwa Canal which flows northward.
sen.cmt: Sakuranobanba-dori Street, Lake Biwa Canalとしました。

sen.j: 南端の冷泉通、冷泉橋東詰の南には京都会館の通用口がある。
sen.e: There is a side entrance of Kyoto Kaikan Hall on the south of the east end of Reizei-bashi bridge on Reizei-doori street at the south end of Sakura-no-banba-doori street.
There is a side entrance of Kyoto Kaikan Hall on the south east end of Reizei-bashi bridge on Reizei-doori street at the south end of Sakura-no-banba-doori street.
There is a side entrance of Kyoto Kaikan Hall on the south east end of Reizei-bashi Bridge on Reizei-dori Street at the south end of Sakuranobanba-dori Street.
sen.cmt: Reizei-bashi Bridge, Reizei-dori Street, Sakuranobanba-dori Streetに修正

tit.cmt: Sakuranobanba-dori Streetとし、頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.j: 京都市武道センター 丸太町下ル
sen.e: Kyoto Municipal Martial Arts Center in the south of Maruta-machi zone.
Kyoto Municipal Martial Arts Center in the south of Maruta-machi zone.
Kyoto Municipal Martial Arts Center in the south of Maruta-machi zone.

sen.j: 旧武徳殿 竹屋町通
sen.e: Ex-Butokuden on Takeyacho-doori street
Ex-Butokuden on Takeyacho-doori street
Ex-Butokuden on Takeyacho-dori Street
Heian-jingu shrine
Heian-jingu shrine
Heian-jingu Shrine
sen.cmt: shrineの頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.e: Biwa Lake Canal
Biwa Lake Canal
Lake Biwa Canal
Kyoto Kaikan Hall
Kyoto Kaikan Hall
Kyoto Kaikan Hall
